name: Leaves (robbossmango89)
description:
A game about a mercenary that was hired to... remove leaves! Remove enough leaves per level to advance. Pesky creatures will appear to steal your points though so scare them away by blowing leaves into them!

Movement: WASD to move around,  use Mouse to move camera.
Interaction: Hold left click to activate air gun to blow leaves away
ESC key: Pause game and bring up menu

Developed with partner H.H.
